SummaryEnglish: Known as "Koko wa Greenwood" in Japanese.  Base on Manga written and illustrated by Yukie Nasu. It has been adapted into Original Video Anime and Live-Action Television Series. // Plot: When a young boy's fist love marries his brother, his last resort is to move into the dorms of the local school. Unfortunately, the school administration places him in the weirdest house on campus with an unusual roommate, and strange neighbors.

1.TitleEnglish: Thou Shalt Love Thy Daily Life
1.SummaryEnglish:
Hasukawa Kazuya is a 15 year old with a problem. He's in love with his
brother's wife! Unable to live in the same house as the newlyweds,
Kazuya moves to a boarding school -- the prestigious Ryokuto Academy.

2.SummaryEnglish: Shinobu's twisted sister, Nagisa, and her henchmen have kidnapped a child in an effort to get revenge on Shinobu for past offenses. The gang of four must combine forces to defeat her. Shinobu is not pleased with his sister, as she had previously kidnapped Mitsuru and stripped him to his underwear.

3.TitleEnglish: The Making of Here is Devilwood
3.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the annual school festival and Shinobu informs everyone that Greenwood will be making a movie. Written and directed by Tochizawa, with computer effects by Aoki, and starring Mitsuru, hinobu and Kazuya, this project could bring in enough money to throw an enormous party!

4.SummaryEnglish:
Misako, a sixteen year old ghost-girl, decides to haunt Mitsuru. It's common knowlege that only unresolved loves and regrets cause hauntings,
but Mitsuru vehemently denies even knowing the girl. Be that as it may, Misako is determined to stay until Mitsuru agrees to kiss her. To make matters worse, Misako will have to possess Shinobu's body in order to
perform the deed, as her own form is insubstantial. . .

5.SummaryEnglish:
Mitsuru's former kouhai, Igarashi Miya, shows up at the dorm, on the run from a bunch of girl gang members. Though she presents a tough exterior,
Miya is in trouble, and she knows it. When Igarashi gets called out, Kazuya and the others have to work fast to help her. Mitsuru also catches a nasty cold, and Shinobu's psychotic sister makes another appearance.

6.SummaryEnglish:
Kazuya can't get Igarashi Miya out of his mind. Is it love? What are his chances with "the punk girl" when she's had a steady boyfriend for the past ten years?! Needing a break, Kazuya visits Mitsuru's home and finds out why his sempai chose to live in the dorms. With encouragement from everyone (including his sister-in-law!), Kazuya decides to confess his
feelings for Igarashi. But first, he has to find her!
